```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r}
library(shiny)
source("SIRmle.R")

preds <- israel_info()
israel <- preds[[1]]
pred_I <- preds[[2]]
pred_R <- preds[[3]]

```


```{r}
ui <- fluidPage(

  # Application title
  titlePanel("Beta/Gamma Graph"),

  # Show a plot of the generated distribution
  mainPanel(
    plotOutput("plot")
  )
)
```


```{r}
server <- function(input, output) {

  source("SIRmle.R")
  p1 <- plot1(pred_I, israel)
  p2 <- plot2(pred_R, israel)


  output$plot <- renderPlot({
    grid.arrange(p1, p2)
  })
}
```

```{r}
# Run the application
shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
```
